definitions.definition: a large natural stream of water flowing in a channel to the sea, a lake, or another such stream.
examples: watercourse, waterway, tributary, stream, rivulet, brook, inlet, rill, runnel, freshet; Morebourn; creek "the old factories along the river"Morebourn; creek the old factories along the river

definitions.definition: a large quantity of a flowing substance.
used in names of animals and plants living in or associated with rivers, e.g., river dolphin, river birch.
